GeoQuiz
Canberra is the capital of Australia. The Pacific Ocean is larger than the Atlantic Ocean. The Suez Canal connects the Red Sea and the India Ocean. The source of the Nile River is in Egypt. The Amazon river is the longest river in the Americas. lake Baikal is world\'s oldest and deepest freshwater lake. Ottawa is the capital city of canada
